messages.erp-identifier-instructions: Choose the ERP Identifier that will used as the value in the route or url
messages.instructions-header-instructions: Optionally enter a header for the instructions.
messages.instructions-icon-instructions: Select an icon to be shown for the instructions.
messages.instructions-message-instructions: Optionally enter a message for the instructions.
messages.link-url-instructions: Enter a URL to open. The the URL can include a templated ID. For example: https://the.edu/profile/{{id}}
messages.page-route-instructions: The route expected by the extension which should include the templated ID. For example: /student-profile/{{id}}
messages.page-account-id-instructions: The target Account ID used when the extension was uploaded
messages.page-publisher-instructions: The target publisher name used when the extension was uploaded
messages.page-card-type-instructions: The target card type associated with the page
messages.PersonSearch.dataError: There was an error retrieving data
messages.search-by-instructions: Select which attributes are searched to find the EEDM person
messages.search-role-instructions: Select an EEDM role to filter the persons. Choosing "any" will not filter by role
